name: Wind Trials
description:
To prove their loyalty to the wind god Nodin, the Kanza Tribe has to undergo a ceremonial test, in wich a talented young member of their tribe is chosen to venture out to the remains of the ancient civilization, in order to obtain the pure Essence of Wind, located on top of Nodins Temple. 

This time around it was Shikoba an energetic young boy with the ability to manipulate the wind with his magical feather.

Controls

Keyboard:      WASD to Move     W/Space to Jump      Shift while in the air to Glide           E to interact     Escape to Pause       

Gamepad:      Left Control Stick to Move      Lower Button to jump      Left Button to interact      Right Trigger while in the air to Glide      Start to Pause
